text: And I will chase away from you the northern adversary, and will drive him away into a dry land, and I will sink 2. 20 Gr. cause to disappear.his face in the former sea, and his back parts in the latter sea, and his 2. 20 Gr. corruption.ill savour shall come up, and his 2. 20 See Job 6. 7.stink shall come up, because he has 2. 20 Gr. magnified his works.wrought great things.
